title: Justice League of America: The Nail
description: Justice League of America Written by Alan Davis; Art by Alan Davis and Mark Farmer Taking place in an alternate reality, JUSTICE LEAGUE OF AMERICA: THE NAIL examines the nature of a world without Superman. Years in the past, a flat tire caused by a nail prevents the Kents from discovering a small rocket ship with an alien baby inside. As a result, the world's greatest hero never comes to be.Collects JUSTICE LEAGUE OF AMERICA: THE NAIL #1-3.
author: Alan Davis
